en: #NAME, I feel as though you've been ignoring me. I know you said your new business would take up a lot of your time, but you can't just wave me to the side because you're busy. Please spend some time with me.
"Thank you so much, honey. It's just... I've had a hard week, and when you're working so hard, I feel like I've got to do it all by myself."
"It's just not the same as when we first started dating. I'm sorry. I'll try to get more used to it."
You try to explain how important it is to be disciplined, but Skylar is not having it. You finish your work with a pit in your stomach.
